issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: MapJoin: 4 million unique integers seems to be a probe plateau

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.summary: Fix to be able to disable max shuffle size DHJ config

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description:
Currently we only check that the max number of entries in the hashmap for a MapJoin surpasses a certain threshold to decide whether to execute a dynamically partitioned hash join.

We would like to factor the size of the large input that we will shuffle for the dynamically partitioned hash join into the cost model too.
fields.summary: Check max shuffle size when converting to dynamically partitioned hash join

ATTACHMENT ID: 12884386 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Pushed to master, thanks for the review [~ashutoshc]!

Doc note:  This adds the configuration parameter *hive.auto.convert.join.shuffle.max.size* and fixes a typo in the description of *hive.auto.convert.join.hashtable.max.entries* (which was introduced in 2.2.0 by HIVE-12492) so they need to be documented in the wiki.

* [Configuration Properties -- Query and DDL Execution | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-QueryandDDLExecution]

Added a TODOC3.0 label.
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
